name: 古碧源
objective:
線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場
效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體(MOSFET)
；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金
氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大
器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器
；振盪器。
schedule:
1 (2/28,3/01): 2/28日放假；3/1 Biasing
2 (3/07,08): Discrete-circuit amplifers
3 (3/14,15): IC biasing
4 (3/21,22): Basic gain cell and CG/CB amplifiers
5 (3/28,29): Cascode amplifier
6 (4/04,05): 放假
7 (4/11,12): Transistor pairings
8 (4/18,19): MOS differential amplifiers
9 (4/25,26): BJT differential amplifers
10 (5/02,03): Low-frequency response
11 (5/09,10): High-frequency response
12 (5/16,17): Basics of feedback
13 (5/23,24): Feedback voltage amplifiers
14 (5/30,31): Other feedback amplifier types
15 (6/06,07): Basics of output stages
16 (6/13,14): Class A and Class B amplifiers
17 (6/20,21): Class AB amplifiers
18 (6/27): Final exam
scorePolicy:
期中考試：65%（2-3次）
期末考試：25%
平時與出勤考核：10%
materials: Microelectronic Circuits, International 7th Ed, Adel Sedra & Kenneth Smith, Oxford University Press, 2016.
